title: Mary Had a Little Lamb
short_plot_summary: Mary has a little lamb that follows her everywhere, even to school one day, causing some disruptions and laughter among her classmates.
explanation: A girl, representing Mary from the song
A sheep, symbolizing the little lamb Mary has
Snow, highlighting the line 'Its fleece was white as snow' in the song
A school, where Mary's lamb followed her one day
Face with tears of joy, representing the laughter and amusement of Mary's classmates when her little lamb follows her to school
